ygData.subject: DOWNLOAD TROUBLE
ygData.msgSnippet: i have a 2001 dell but i have a 56k modem. I downloaded the first part of the patch(the one that shows the windows icon) and then i got to the 2nd part(the one
ygData.messageBody:
i have a 2001 dell but i have a 56k modem. I
downloaded the first part of the patch(the one that shows
the windows icon) and then i got to the 2nd part(the
one with the vah shir and the EQ lady) and it tells
me that it will take an estimated 27 hours to
download the patch. thats just fuc*in nutz.who in the hell
would stay online for 27 hours to download a patch.
people have to go to school and go to work. and people
have 2 use the phone. what if my gradfather dies and
someone has 2 get in touch with me ?i would never know.
is anyone else with a 56k modem having this LONGGGG
!!!!! download process ?
